Class TimerContainerRequestFilter

java.lang.Object
uk.co.spudsoft.vertx.rest.TimerContainerRequestFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter
public class TimerContainerRequestFilter extends Object implements jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestFilter
JAX-RS filter to set up metrics on the request context. The companion TimerContainerResponseFilter is required to complete the metrics.
Author:
njt

    • getSample

      public static io.micrometer.core.instrument.Timer.Sample getSample(jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext crc)
      Get the current micrometer sample. Designed for use within the request method - will only return a valid name after the filter has been called.
      Parameters:
      crc - the request context.
      Returns:
      the current micrometer sample.

      public static io.micrometer.core.annotation.Timed getAnnotation(jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext crc)

      Returns:

    • getName

      public static String getName(jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext crc)
      Get the name of the timer, extracted from the request context and constructed from the method name. Designed for use within the request method - will only return a valid name after the filter has been called.
      Parameters:
      crc - the request context.
      Returns:
      the name of the timer.
